name: NPC Quirks
description: Quick personality traits, mannerisms, and quirks to make any NPC memorable. Roll once or multiple times!

entries.result: Speaks in the third person
Constantly fidgets with a coin or small object
Laughs at inappropriate moments
Never makes eye contact
Always whispers, even when it's unnecessary
Ends every sentence as if it were a question
Obsessively clean, constantly dusting or wiping things
Has a nervous twitch in one eye
Speaks incredibly slowly and deliberately
Always eating something, talks with mouth full
Uses overly flowery and dramatic language
Suspicious of everyone, checks over shoulder frequently
Hums or whistles tunelessly when nervous
Constantly apologizes for everything
Speaks in rhymes (or tries to)
Has an imaginary friend they occasionally address
Collects something unusual (teeth, buttons, feathers)
Always knows what time it is, to the minute
Terrible with names, calls everyone by wrong names
Overshares personal information immediately
Never sits down, always standing or pacing
Sniffs people when meeting them
Speaks only in questions
Has a pet they talk to constantly (rat, spider, toad)
Incredibly superstitious, sees omens in everything
Always cold, bundled up even in summer
Compulsive liar about trivial things
Speaks very loudly, nearly shouting
Uses wrong words confidently ('I'm feeling very photosynthesis today')
Constantly bragging about a mediocre accomplishment
Hiccups when lying
Obsessed with a specific color, wears only that color
Always has a cold or is sniffling
Dramatically sighs before speaking
Refers to past events that never happened
Winks constantly, even when it doesn't make sense
Absolutely terrified of a common thing (birds, cheese, stairs)
Claims to have met every famous person mentioned
Narrates their own actions out loud
Has a very specific and strange diet restriction
Speaks with a different accent each conversation
Always negotiating, even for non-transactional things
Writes everything down in a little notebook
Laughs before delivering bad news
Stares intensely without blinking
Has an incredibly firm handshake, won't let go
Counts things constantly (steps, words, ceiling tiles)
Speaks only in proverbs and sayings
Terrible personal space awareness, stands too close
Always mentions their 'important friend' who can help
Scratches themselves constantly
Finishes other people's sentences (usually wrong)
Extremely gullible, believes anything told to them
Has a complicated secret handshake they insist on using
Speaks to inanimate objects like they're alive
Constantly complaining about an old injury
Has strong opinions about something mundane (bread types, chair design)
Always assumes the worst possible interpretation
Refuses to use contractions ('I am' never 'I'm')
Fascinated by the party's equipment, asks many questions
Has a catchphrase they use constantly
Clears throat before every sentence
Extremely forgetful, repeats themselves often
Deeply offended by something random in conversation
Only speaks when spoken to directly
Convinced they're being followed or watched
Uses finger guns and sound effects
Mispronounces common words confidently
Has a visible scar with an obviously fake backstory
Treats their weapon/tool like a beloved child
Always tired, yawning constantly
Responds to questions with questions
Insists on formal titles for everyone
Wildly gestures while talking, nearly hits people
Smells strongly of something specific (fish, flowers, smoke)
Pauses mid-sentence to think, loses train of thought
Carries on a feud with someone not present
Believes in a conspiracy theory they share freely
Talks about their ex constantly
Has a lucky charm they clutch when nervous
Incredibly competitive about everything
Falls asleep briefly during conversation
Uses outdated slang from decades ago
Constantly checking their appearance in reflections
Speaks differently depending on who's listening
Has a tell when they're hiding something
Absolutely cannot keep a secret
Insists everyone is younger/older than they look
Hates being touched, flinches away
Always has dirt or stains on their hands
Speaks fondly of 'the old days' (last week)
Has a habit of pocketing small items absentmindedly
Very literal, doesn't understand figures of speech
Convinced they've met the party before
Cracks knuckles or joints frequently
Always looking for something they've lost
Burps or has indigestion mid-conversation
Insists on shaking hands multiple times
Has a very distinctive laugh (snorting, wheezing, silent)
Roll twice and combine both quirks
